item.title: Introduction to Women at Risk, International
item.description:
"Every 2-4 years the world looks away from a victim count on the scale of the Jewish Holocaust... Women in this world face nothing short of a Hidden Gendercide" ~The Economist
There is a WAR raging against women and children in this world. Women at Risk, International is a ministry dedicated to helping women, one battle at a time in the name of Christ.

item.title: Homeland Security Interview Part One.wmv
item.description: Listen in as The President of WAR, Int'l interviews Amy Allen of Homeland Security on Human Trafficking taking place in the land of the free, the United States. Learn how you can protect yourself and your children. Become aware of how you can influence and help those within your community in raising awareness of trafficking.
